Игра вобрала в себя всё лучшее от Counter-Strike: Source и Counter-Strike 1.6, прибавив в динамике, графике да и в геймплее в целом, с различными интересными плюшками в виде официальных новых режимов игры, карт, оружии и внимании в деталям. Следующая эпоха CS, которая однозначно затмит предыдущие.

Been playing for 3k+ hours but I get matched up agains ~2-3 new accounts (who are obvious cheaters) every match with prime. 
VAC is a joke.

Pros:
-many game modes
-good mechanics/physics
-great competitive maps
-great skins/stickers/graffitis
-great xp reward system
-great weapons and spray pattern physics



Cons:
-toxic community
-too many cheaters
-toxic environment
-lack of constructive communication between teammates/opponents
-lack of anti-cheat software like FACEIT or ESEA
-free to play

Needed Updates
-cooldowns for toxic voice and audio messages
-one account per individual verified by with their unique ID
-anti-cheat software which is launched before the game

----------------------------------------------
Update: 03/04/2021
Cons:
-too many cheaters,SPINBOTTERS :(
Edit:After 4K hours on different accounts,this game is worth playing but there are too many cheaters...


Total game score: 7/10

[h1]My Suggestions of This Game for Newcomers[/h1]

  This game is not tolerant for the newcomers, what I suggest is play with friends and stay calm during the unpredictable situations, for example, there are so many new accounts is from some dum***s hackers, just do not feel too bad.

  I’ve been trying to play in rank, but the reality is 4 out of 5 games have hackers. Well, I felt too bad to these hackers because they don’t know how to play this game.

[i]By 枪音ミク (Kasaki Sakili)[/i]
Funny tactical shooting game - always something you can improve at

It's fun untill it's not. Dont get me wrong I'm huge fun but sometimes nothing goes as planned  in this accursed world. The longer you live, the more you realize that the only thing that truly exist in this reality are merely pain, suffering and futility.
listen, everywhere you look in this world, wherever there is light, there will always be shadow to be found as well. As long as there is a concept of victors, the vanquished will also exist. The selfish intent of wanting to preserve peace, initiates wars, and hatred is born in order to protect love. There are nexuses, causal relationships that can not be separated.
Если ты готов к разорваному очку и двум отцам в твоей жизни, то игра создана для тебя!
